label: Bnd-AddXmlToTest
description: Add XML resources from the tested bundle to the output of a test report.

label: Bnd-LastModified
description: **Timestamp** from bnd, aggregated last modified time of its resources.

label: Bundle-Blueprint
description: The **Bundle-Activator** header specifies the name of the class used to start and stop the bundle.

label: Bundle-Contributors
description: Lists the bundle contributors according to the Maven bundle-contributors pom entry.

label: Conditional-Package
description: **Recursively add packages** from the class path when referred and when they match one of the package specifications.

label: Meta-Persistence
description: A **Persistence Bundle** is a bundle that contains the **Meta-Persistence** header. If this header is not present, then this specification does not apply and a JPA Provider should ignore the corresponding bundle.

label: Service-Component
description: XML documents containing component descriptions must be specified by the Service-Component header in the manifest.

label: Test-Cases
description: Header to automatically execute tests in the bnd JUnit tester.

label: Tool
description: **Bnd version** used to build this bundle.
